title: Bridging the size gap between experiment and theory: large-scale DFT calculations on realistic sized Pd particles for acetylene hydrogenation
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,27799-27808
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA03369H, Paper

Apostolos Kordatos, Khaled Mohammed, Reza Vakili, Haresh Manyar, Alexandre Goguet, Emma Gibson, Marina Carravetta, Peter Wells, Chris-Kriton Skylaris
The hydrogenation of acetylene on entire large Pd/PdCx nanoparticles has been investigated via large-scale DFT simulations. The impact of interstitial C has been examined whilst addressing the challenge of the simulation system size.
